page.title: 03TOURISTS
page.content: The tourist industory in Walton caters mainly for day-trippers and caravan dwellers.There are a couple of hotels in the town,but it seems that most weekly visitors stay at one of the three caravan camps where they can be entertained.Day visitors come by rail, coach or private car and usually spend most of their time on the beach or at the parks.Other attractions in the town itself include amusement arcades and the pier. Walton is well known for its long golden beaches and these are enjoyed by thousands of trippers each summer.
